explains: n. 天文台，气象台；视野开阔的位置（或建筑物）
wordGroup: meteorological observatory 气象台；气象观测所
national radio astronomy observatory 国立射电天文台

sentences.en: This makes it seem unlikely Nazca is an observatory.
sentences.cn: 这使得纳斯卡不太可能是一个天文台。

sentences.en: There is a small network of rhombus in tokyo astronomical observatory.
sentences.cn: 东京天文台有一个小的菱形网。

sentences.en: Here's an irony, the building we are in now, the astronomy building not far from our observatory, has unshielded lights.
sentences.cn: 讽刺的是，我们现在所在的这栋楼，离我们天文台不远的那座天文楼，竟然有未屏蔽的灯。
